frontmatter.title: Killing Puppies.
frontmatter.short: Projects fail, not people.  When I get a project I am relentless about making things happen.  It is hard (but necessary) to admit when things aren’t happening; no one wants to drown a puppy.  That is what it feels like some times.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions

mdx.excerpt: Patrick Pichette on optimizing human infrastructure to deal with failed projects: The people on the project know that it is failing – as…
